name: total-app
description: Cross-platform Desktop / Mobile / Web application starter.

scripts.svelte:prebuild: echo RUN svelte:prebuild && rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && svelte-kit sync && tsx scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.svelte:predev: echo RUN svelte:predev   && rimraf dev-dist                    && svelte-kit sync && tsx scripts/assets-copy.ts
scripts.dev: echo RUN dev(:http)                                    && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env SW_DEV=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* NO_HTTPS=1 vite dev --port 3000
scripts.dev:https: echo RUN dev:https                                     && pnpm svelte:predev     && cross-env SW_DEV=true DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* vite dev --port 3000
scripts.build:base: echo RUN build:base                                     && pnpm svelte:prebuild   && vite build
scripts.preview:http: echo RUN preview:http                                  &&  cross-env NO_HTTPS=1 vite preview --port 4173
scripts.test: pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:unit
scripts.test:integration: echo RUN test:integration                               && cross-env NO_HTTPS=1 playwright test
scripts.test:integration:debug: echo RUN test:integration:debug                         && cross-env NO_HTTPS=1 playwright test --headed --timeout=0
scripts.check: echo RUN check                                          && svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.check:watch: echo RUN check:watch                                   &&  svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --watch
scripts.all: pnpm i && pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:integration && pnpm check
